import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get funding source by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/funding-sources/{FundingSourceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single funding source record for the supplied FundingSourceId, including allocation totals, status/type metadata, and lifecycle dates. Use this when you need authoritative values before editing or deleting a funding source.

**Prerequisites**
1. **FundingSourceId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) to list funding sources and extract `Items[].FundingSourceId`, or capture the ID returned from [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/new](/docs/api/funding-sources/create-funding-source).

**Workflow Example**
1. Search: [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) with filters (optional) to identify the funding source.
2. Retrieve detail: [GET /api/v1.0/funding-sources/\{FundingSourceId\}](/docs/api/funding-sources/get-funding-source-by-id) to load full metadata for display or editing.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `FundingSourceId` (path).

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"FundingSourceId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the funding source to retrieve","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
